message.content:
cs.CL, cs.IR, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.SI 

This paper deals with natural language processing and machine learning techniques to identify the quality of product reviews. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.CL (Computation and Language). The paper also involves information retrieval techniques to rank useful reviews, making cs.IR (Information Retrieval) another likely sub-category. The paper also uses latent semantic factors and a Hidden Markov Model, which are common in machine learning and artificial intelligence, making cs.LG (Machine Learning) and cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) likely sub-categories. Finally, the paper deals with community-level features and generalizability, which are common in social networks and online platforms, making cs.SI (Social and Information Networks) a possible sub-category.
